sectionSubtitle: Everything you need to know about AlmostaCMS

questions.question: Is it really free?
questions.answer: Yes! AlmostaCMS is completely free and open source (MIT License). We use GitHub Pages for hosting, which is free for public repositories. There are no hidden costs, no credit card required.

questions.question: Do I need to know how to code?
questions.answer: No! AlmostaCMS has a visual editor for all content. You edit your website through beautiful forms, just like any other CMS. The only time you'd touch code is if you want to customize the design (which is optional).

questions.question: Can I use my own domain name?
questions.answer: Yes! GitHub Pages supports custom domains. You can connect your own domain (e.g., www.yourname.com) to your AlmostaCMS site.

questions.question: What if I want to switch to another platform?
questions.answer: No lock-in! Your website lives in your own GitHub repository. You can download all your content anytime, or connect it to any other platform. You truly own your data.

questions.question: How do I update my content?
questions.answer: Just visit yoursite.com/admin, login with GitHub, and edit your content through our visual forms. Changes are saved to your GitHub repository and your site rebuilds automatically in about 30 seconds.

questions.question: Do I need a GitHub account?
questions.answer: Yes, you need a free GitHub account. Don't have one? It takes 30 seconds to create at github.com. GitHub is used by over 100 million developers worldwide and is completely free for personal use.
